project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Create a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts using a JSON file for data storage.

task.name: Implement the structure for storing contacts
Implement the feature to add a new contact
Implement the feature to search for a contact
Implement the feature to update a contact
Implement the feature to delete a contact
Implement the functionality to read contacts from a JSON file
Implement the functionality to write contacts to a JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
